publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2370 Rosie Kane: Alaska’s Arctic National Wildlife Refuge—That the Parliament recognises the international importance of all national parks; acknowledges that development in any national park can adversely affect the whole planet; agrees that the Sandford Principle should be the founding principle of all national parks and that they should be afforded maximum protection under the law, and calls on the Scottish Executive to urge the US House of Representatives Resources Committee not to vote to revive the energy bill that would allow oil drilling in Alaska’s Arctic National Wildlife Refuge.

S2M-2370 Rosie Kane: Alaska’s Arctic National Wildlife Refuge—That the Parliament recognises the international importance of all national parks; acknowledges that development in any national park can adversely affect the whole planet; agrees that the Sandford Principle should be the founding principle of all national parks and that they should be afforded maximum protection under the law, and calls on the Scottish Executive to urge the US House of Representatives Resources Committee not to vote to revive the energy bill that would allow oil drilling in Alaska’s Arctic National Wildlife Refuge.
S2M-2370 Alaska’s Arctic National Wildlife Refuge (lodged on 3 February 2005) Carolyn Leckie*, Frances Curran*
S2M-2370 Alaska’s Arctic National Wildlife Refuge (lodged on 3 February 2005) Nora Radcliffe*
